serviceName: IXCM工作室公益下载站(IXCM Studio)
msg:
【更新内容】
【update content】
0.118.32:
1.同步官方升级
Synchronous official upgrade
2.修复菜单滑动错误
Fix menu sliding bug
3.增加文件视图管理器(可随时使用视图查看linux目录了)
Add a file view manager (you can use the view to view the linux directory at any time)
3.1：现在可以随时在目录创建内存卡软连接了
Now you can create a memory card soft link in the directory at any time
3.2：根据视图目录跳转至终端目录
Jump to the terminal directory according to the view directory
3.3：现在可以安装任意目录的恢复包、模块包
Now you can install recovery packages and module packages in any directory
3.4：增加解压支持：tar.gz、gat.xz、tar.bz2、7Z、ZIP
Add decompression support: tar.gz, gat.xz, tar.bz2, 7Z, ZIP
3.5：可以播放音乐
can play music3.6：视图文件夹中的文件可一键编译或者使用VIM一键编辑
Files in the view folder can be compiled with one click or edited with one click using VIM
3.7：视图当中的文件可以尝试终端运行
The files in the view can try to run the terminal
4.现在按音量键 + - 呼出左侧/右侧菜单栏
Now press the volume key + - to bring up the left/right menu bar

data.name: 点击上方蓝色字体，进入网页下载站
data.note:
点击上方蓝色字体，进入网页下载站
Click on the blue font above to go to the web download site
